lexUnit.name: circle.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a group of people with a shared profession, interests, or acquaintance

sentence.text: The original stress may have disappeared but the anxiety symptoms are maintained by a vicious circle of catastrophic thoughts and maladaptive behaviour .

A circle of hungry crows soared noisily above a clump of oak trees , branches black against the lightening sky .
